scripts.docker:build-compile: export PROJECT=$(echo ${npm_package_name} | cut -d "/" -f2) && docker buildx build --target compile-stage --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 --build-arg PROXY=$(jq -r .proxy package.json) --build-arg PROJECT=${PROJECT} -t infernokun/${npm_package_name}:compile . || exit 1
scripts.docker:build-runtime: export PROJECT=$(echo ${npm_package_name} | cut -d "/" -f2) && docker buildx build --target runtime-stage --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 --build-arg PROXY=$(jq -r .proxy package.json) --build-arg PORT=$(jq -r .port package.json) --build-arg PROJECT=${PROJECT} -t infernokun/${npm_package_name}:latest . || exit 1
scripts.docker:push: export VERSION=v$(jq -r .version package.json) && docker push infernokun/${npm_package_name}:${VERSION} || exit 1
scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:build-compile -s && npm run docker:build-runtime -s && npm run docker:push -s
